about_the_game:
Vanguard Princess: Demo Edition
Experience the Magic Before the Full Battle Begins!

Step into the captivating world of Vanguard Princess with this action-packed demo version! Get a taste of the fast-paced 2D fighting game that pits powerful heroines against each other in a world transformed by mystical energy.

What’s Included in the Demo?

  • Sample Story Mode
    Experience a glimpse of the Story Mode with two playable characters. Discover the beginning of the thrilling narrative that sets the stage for the Vanguard Princess saga.

  • Versus Mode

    Choose from two playable fighters and challenge friends or AI opponents in intense one-on-one battles.

    • Tutorial Mode: Master the basics with a fully functional Tutorial Mode that teaches you everything from movement to advanced fighting techniques.

    • Training Mode: Hone your skills in Training Mode, where you can practice combos and perfect your strategies with complete control over the battlefield.

Why Play the Demo?

  • This demo is your chance to immerse yourself in the vibrant world of Vanguard Princess, with stunning anime-inspired visuals, fluid animations, and dynamic combat mechanics. Whether you're a newcomer or a seasoned fighting game fan, the demo is designed to give you a taste of the action before the full release.

Are You Ready to Fight?

The world of Vanguard Princess awaits—will you rise to the challenge?

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains fanservice-oriented character designs, with revealing outfits and exaggerated body proportions.
Certain attack animations emphasize suggestive elements, including jiggle physics and exposed clothing.

name: Vanguard Princess (2025) Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 10, 8.1, 8, 7, XP, 2000
  • Processor: Pentium III 400MHz, 128MB RAM
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 32MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 10, 8.1, 8, 7, XP, 2000
  • Processor: Pentium III 400MHz, 128MB RAM
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 32MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Step into the action with this demo of Vanguard Princess! Play as 2 characters in Story and Versus Modes, master skills in fully functional Tutorial and Training Modes, and compete online with up to 20 players. Stunning visuals and intense combat await!
